products.name: BeatBot AquaSense 2 Pro
products.tagline: Master Every Pool Zone! Surface Skimming, Wall Scaling & Water Clarifying from this 5-in-1 Intelligent Powerhouse.
whatWeLike: True 5-in-1 cleaning tackles every pool zone (even surface!).
Exceptional wall climbing & waterline scrubbing power.
Visibly clarifies water while reducing chemical needs.
Intelligent navigation ensures efficient, full coverage.
Smart features simplify retrieval & operation.

products.name: Dolphin Nautilus CC Plus Wi-Fi
products.tagline: The Proven All-Rounder, Making Reliable Cleaning & Smart Scheduling Easy.
whatWeLike: Delivers consistently thorough floor and wall cleaning.
CleverClean™ smart navigation ensures efficient pool coverage.
Wi-Fi app allows easy weekly scheduling ("set & forget").
Top-load filter basket makes cleanup incredibly simple.
Energy-efficient design keeps running costs very low.
keyFeatures: Dual Scrubbing Brushes for Floor & Wall Cleaning
Wi-Fi Enabled with MyDolphin™ Plus App (Weekly Scheduler)
60 ft. Anti-Tangle Swivel Cable (For Pools up to 50 ft)

products.name: AIPER Scuba S1 Cordless
products.tagline: Cut the Cord, Not the Clean! True Pool Freedom Has Arrived.
whatWeLike: Complete freedom from cords & tangling hassles.
150-minute runtime covers most pools thoroughly.
Smart path planning maximizes battery efficiency.
4 powerful motors deliver surprising cleaning power.
Lightweight design makes handling remarkably easy.

products.name: Dolphin E10 (2025 Model)
products.tagline: Premium Cleaning Power at an Entry-Level Price – Perfect for Smaller Pools!
whatWeLike: Exceptional value with premium cleaning capabilities.
Simple one-button operation perfect for beginners.
Active scrubbing brush tackles stubborn debris.
Compact design ideal for above-ground and smaller pools.
Low maintenance with easy-clean filter basket.
keyFeatures: Top-Load Filter Basket for Easy Cleaning

products.name: Polaris PCX 868 iQ Smart Robotic
products.tagline: Intelligence Meets Power – App-Controlled Precision for Crystal Clear Results!
whatWeLike: iAquaLink app provides complete remote control.
4WD technology conquers any pool surface.
Vortex vacuum technology captures ultra-fine debris.
7-day programmable timer for set-and-forget convenience.
Easy-lift system makes removal effortless.

products.name: BeatBot AquaSense 2 Ultra
products.tagline: The Ultimate Pool Cleaning Experience – Where Innovation Meets Perfection!
whatWeLike: Revolutionary surface skimming technology.
AI-powered navigation learns your pool layout.
Industry-leading battery life (15 hours).
Self-cleaning filter system reduces maintenance.
Premium build quality with 3-year warranty.
keyFeatures: AI Path Planning with Pool Mapping

products.name: WYBOT C2 Vision AI Camera Cordless
products.tagline: See What Your Cleaner Sees – AI Vision Technology for Unmatched Precision!
whatWeLike: Built-in camera shows real-time pool conditions.
AI vision technology identifies problem areas.
Cordless design with impressive 180-minute runtime.
App provides live video feed during cleaning.
Obstacle avoidance prevents getting stuck.

products.name: AIPER Scuba X1 Cordless
products.tagline: Next-Gen Cordless Power – Unleash Superior Cleaning Without Limits!
whatWeLike: Advanced quad-motor system for powerful suction.
WavePath Navigation 2.0 ensures complete coverage.
Wall climbing capability reaches waterline.
Eco-friendly with solar charging option.
Ultra-quiet operation won't disturb relaxation.

products.name: Dolphin Premier
products.tagline: Commercial-Grade Performance for Residential Pools – The Professional's Choice!
whatWeLike: Multi-media filtration captures all debris types.
Weekly timer with multiple cycle options.
Dual scrubbing brushes deep clean surfaces.

Proven reliability with commercial-grade components.

products.name: Polaris 9550 Sport Robotic
products.tagline: Unleash the Beast – Maximum Power Meets Intelligent Design!
whatWeLike: Motion-sensing remote for easy spot cleaning.
Rear water cleaning stream for enhanced coverage.
4WD provides unmatched climbing ability.
Extra-large debris canister reduces emptying.
Dirty canister indicator alerts when full.

products.name: Betta SE Solar Powered Pool Skimmer
products.tagline: Harness the Sun – Eco-Friendly Surface Cleaning That Never Stops!
whatWeLike: 100% solar powered with zero operating costs.
Continuous surface cleaning during daylight.

Environmentally friendly solution.
